title: Bug 32286: Button Tab Style Change Resets Orientation
description: When changing styles in the ControlExample Button Tab, the button orientation resets unexpectedly. To reproduce, ensure Eclipse is not running and accept new configuration defaults.
OB: After accepting new configuration defaults, the buttons change to arrow buttons pointing upwards.
EB: The button orientation should remain consistent even after selecting or deselecting SWT.BORDER in the styles group.
SR: Navigate to the ControlExample Button Tab.
Observe the buttons changing to arrow buttons pointing upwards.
Select or deselect SWT.BORDER in the styles group.
Verify that the button orientation remains unchanged.
